insert into ms_member_mobile_area (mem_id, phone, province_name, city_name, sp, create_date) values
(#{item.memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
